mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_CARD_Other (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_card_no ,
ass_ori_card_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
gb_code ,
ass_spec ,
ass_mondl ,
ass_brand ,
ass_amount ,
unit_code ,
fac_no ,
fac_id ,
ven_id ,
ven_no ,
is_dept ,
dept_id ,
dept_no ,
store_id ,
store_no ,
price ,
depre_money ,
manage_depre_money ,
cur_money ,
fore_money ,
buy_type ,
use_state ,
is_depr ,
depr_method ,
acc_depre_amount ,
is_manage_depre ,
manage_depr_method ,
manage_depre_amount ,
is_measure ,
is_throw ,
pact_code ,
contract_code ,
file_number ,
ins_money ,
ins_date ,
accept_emp ,
accept_date ,
service_date ,
ass_seq_no ,
location ,
note ,
ass_in_no ,
in_date ,
run_date ,
is_bar ,
bar_type ,
bar_code ,
bar_url ,
book_amount ,
relic_amount ,
relic_grade_code ,
is_init ,
dispose_type ,
dispose_cost ,
dispose_income ,
dispose_tax ,
ass_purpose ,
proj_id ,
proj_no ,
dispose_date ,
apply_date ,
add_depre_month ,
add_manage_month ,
reg_no ,
is_bar_print ,
measure_type ,
measure_king_code ,
simple_name ,
production_date ,
proc_store_id ,
proc_store_no ,
common_name ,
six_type_code ,
) VALUES (
to_number(#{group_id}) ,
to_number(#{hos_id}) ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{ass_card_no} ,
#{ass_ori_card_no} ,
to_number(#{ass_id}) ,
to_number(#{ass_no}) ,
#{gb_code} ,
#{ass_spec} ,
#{ass_mondl} ,
#{ass_brand} ,
to_number(#{ass_amount}) ,
#{unit_code} ,
to_number(#{fac_no}) ,
to_number(#{fac_id}) ,
to_number(#{ven_id}) ,
to_number(#{ven_no}) ,
to_number(#{is_dept}) ,
to_number(#{dept_id}) ,
to_number(#{dept_no}) ,
to_number(#{store_id}) ,
to_number(#{store_no}) ,
to_number(#{price}) ,
to_number(#{depre_money}) ,
to_number(#{manage_depre_money}) ,
to_number(#{cur_money}) ,
to_number(#{fore_money}) ,
#{buy_type} ,
to_number(#{use_state}) ,
to_number(#{is_depr}) ,
#{depr_method} ,
to_number(#{acc_depre_amount}) ,
to_number(#{is_manage_depre}) ,
#{manage_depr_method} ,
to_number(#{manage_depre_amount}) ,
to_number(#{is_measure}) ,
to_number(#{is_throw}) ,
#{pact_code} ,
#{contract_code} ,
#{file_number} ,
to_number(#{ins_money}) ,
to_date (#{ins_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_number(#{accept_emp}) ,
to_date (#{accept_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_date (#{service_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
#{ass_seq_no} ,
#{location} ,
#{note} ,
#{ass_in_no} ,
to_date (#{in_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_date (#{run_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_number(#{is_bar}) ,
to_number(#{bar_type}) ,
#{bar_code} ,
#{bar_url} ,
#{book_amount} ,
#{relic_amount} ,
#{relic_grade_code} ,
to_number(#{is_init}) ,
to_number(#{dispose_type}) ,
to_number(#{dispose_cost}) ,
to_number(#{dispose_income}) ,
to_number(#{dispose_tax}) ,
#{ass_purpose} ,
to_number(#{proj_id}) ,
to_number(#{proj_no}) ,
to_date (#{dispose_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_date (#{apply_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_number(#{add_depre_month}) ,
to_number(#{add_manage_month}) ,
#{reg_no} ,
to_number(#{is_bar_print}) ,
to_number(#{measure_type}) ,
#{measure_king_code} ,
#{simple_name} ,
to_date (#{production_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
to_number(#{proc_store_id}) ,
to_number(#{proc_store_no}) ,
#{common_name} ,
#{six_type_code} ,
)

INSERT INTO ASS_CARD_Other ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , ass_card_no , ass_ori_card_no , ass_id , ass_no , gb_code , ass_spec , ass_mondl , ass_brand , ass_amount , unit_code , fac_no , fac_id , ven_id , ven_no , is_dept , dept_id , dept_no , store_id , store_no , price , depre_money , manage_depre_money , cur_money , fore_money , buy_type , use_state , is_depr , depr_method , acc_depre_amount , is_manage_depre , manage_depr_method , manage_depre_amount , is_measure , is_throw , pact_code , contract_code , file_number , ins_money , ins_date , accept_emp , accept_date , service_date , ass_seq_no , location , note , ass_in_no , in_date , run_date , is_bar , bar_type , bar_code , bar_url , book_amount , relic_amount , relic_grade_code , is_init , dispose_type , dispose_cost , dispose_income , dispose_tax , ass_purpose , proj_id , proj_no , dispose_date , apply_date , add_depre_month , add_manage_month , reg_no , is_bar_print , measure_type , measure_king_code , simple_name , production_date , proc_store_id , proc_store_no , common_name , six_type_code ) select t.* from(
select #{item.group_id}, #{item.hos_id}, #{item.copy_code}, #{item.ass_card_no}, #{item.ass_ori_card_no}, null ass_ori_card_no, #{item.ass_id}, null ass_id, #{item.ass_no}, null ass_no, #{item.gb_code}, null gb_code, #{item.ass_spec}, null ass_spec, #{item.ass_mondl}, null ass_mondl, #{item.ass_brand}, null ass_brand, #{item.ass_amount}, null ass_amount, #{item.unit_code}, null unit_code, #{item.fac_no}, null fac_no, #{item.fac_id}, null fac_id, #{item.ven_id}, null ven_id, #{item.ven_no}, null ven_no, #{item.is_dept}, null is_dept, #{item.dept_id}, null dept_id, #{item.dept_no}, null dept_no, #{item.store_id}, null store_id, #{item.store_no}, null store_no, #{item.price}, null price, #{item.depre_money}, null depre_money, #{item.manage_depre_money}, null manage_depre_money, #{item.cur_money}, null cur_money, #{item.fore_money}, null fore_money, #{item.buy_type}, null buy_type, #{item.use_state}, null use_state, #{item.is_depr}, null is_depr, #{item.depr_method}, null depr_method, #{item.acc_depre_amount}, null acc_depre_amount, #{item.is_manage_depre}, null is_manage_depre, #{item.manage_depr_method}, null manage_depr_method, #{item.manage_depre_amount}, null manage_depre_amount, #{item.is_measure}, null is_measure, #{item.is_throw}, null is_throw, #{item.pact_code}, null pact_code, #{item.contract_code}, null contract_code, #{item.file_number}, null file_number, #{item.ins_money}, null ins_money, #{item.ins_date}, null ins_date, #{item.accept_emp}, null accept_emp, #{item.accept_date}, null accept_date, #{item.service_date}, null service_date, #{item.ass_seq_no}, null ass_seq_no, #{item.location}, null location, #{item.note}, null note, #{item.ass_in_no}, null ass_in_no, #{item.in_date}, null in_date, #{item.run_date}, null run_date, #{item.is_bar}, null is_bar, #{item.bar_type}, null bar_type, #{item.bar_code}, null bar_code, #{item.bar_url}, null bar_url, #{item.book_amount}, null book_amount, #{item.relic_amount}, null relic_amount, #{item.relic_grade_code}, null relic_grade_code, #{item.is_init}, null is_init, #{item.dispose_type}, null dispose_type, #{item.dispose_cost}, null dispose_cost, #{item.dispose_income}, null dispose_income, #{item.dispose_tax}, null dispose_tax, #{item.ass_purpose}, null ass_purpose, #{item.proj_id}, null proj_id, #{item.proj_no}, null proj_no, #{item.dispose_date}, null dispose_date, #{item.apply_date}, null apply_date, #{item.add_depre_month}, null add_depre_month, #{item.add_manage_month}, null add_manage_month, #{item.reg_no}, null reg_no, #{item.is_bar_print}, null is_bar_print, #{item.measure_type}, null measure_type,
#{item.measure_king_code}, null measure_king_code,
#{item.simple_name}, null simple_name,
#{item.production_date}, null production_date,
#{item.proc_store_id}, null proc_store_id,
#{item.proc_store_no}, null proc_store_no,
#{item.common_name}, null common_name,
#{item.six_type_code} null six_type_code
from dual
)t
mapper.update:
UPDATE ass_card_Other
ass_ori_card_no = #{ass_ori_card_no} ,
ass_id = to_number(#{ass_id}) ,
ass_no = to_number(#{ass_no}) ,
gb_code = #{gb_code} , ass_spec = #{ass_spec} , ass_mondl = #{ass_mondl} , ass_brand = #{ass_brand} ,
ass_amount = to_number(#{ass_amount}) ,
unit_code = #{unit_code} ,
fac_no = to_number(#{fac_no}) ,
fac_id = to_number(#{fac_id}) ,
ven_id = to_number(#{ven_id}) ,
ven_no = to_number(#{ven_no}) ,
is_dept = to_number(#{is_dept}) ,
dept_id = to_number(#{dept_id}) ,
dept_no = to_number(#{dept_no}) ,
store_id = to_number(#{store_id}) ,
store_no = to_number(#{store_no}) ,
price = to_number(#{price}) ,
depre_money = to_number(#{depre_money}) ,
manage_depre_money = to_number(#{manage_depre_money}) ,
cur_money = to_number(#{cur_money}) ,
fore_money = to_number(#{fore_money}) ,
buy_type = #{buy_type} ,
use_state = to_number(#{use_state}) ,
is_depr = to_number(#{is_depr}) ,
depr_method = #{depr_method} ,
acc_depre_amount = to_number(#{acc_depre_amount}) ,
is_manage_depre = to_number(#{is_manage_depre}) ,
manage_depr_method = #{manage_depr_method} ,
manage_depre_amount = to_number(#{manage_depre_amount}) ,
is_measure = to_number(#{is_measure}) ,
is_throw = to_number(#{is_throw}) ,
pact_code = #{pact_code} ,
ins_money = to_number(#{ins_money}) ,
ins_date = to_date (#{ins_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
accept_emp = to_number(#{accept_emp}) ,
accept_date = to_date (#{accept_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
service_date = to_date (#{service_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
ass_seq_no = #{ass_seq_no} , location = #{location} , note = #{note} ,
ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no} ,
in_date = to_date (#{in_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
run_date = to_date (#{run_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
is_bar = to_number(#{is_bar}) ,
bar_type = to_number(#{bar_type}) ,
bar_code = #{bar_code} , bar_url = #{bar_url} ,
book_amount = to_number(#{book_amount}) ,
relic_amount = to_number(#{relic_amount}) ,
relic_grade_code = #{relic_grade_code} ,
is_init = to_number(#{is_init}) ,
dispose_type = to_number(#{dispose_type}) ,
dispose_cost = to_number(#{dispose_cost}) ,
dispose_income = to_number(#{dispose_income}) ,
dispose_tax = to_number(#{dispose_tax}) ,
ass_purpose = #{ass_purpose} ,
proj_id = to_number(#{proj_id}) ,
proj_no = to_number(#{proj_no}) ,
dispose_date = to_date (#{dispose_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
apply_date = to_date (#{apply_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
add_depre_month = to_number(#{add_depre_month}) ,
add_manage_month = to_number(#{add_manage_month}) ,
reg_no = #{reg_no} ,
measure_type = #{measure_type} ,
measure_king_code = #{measure_king_code} ,
simple_name = #{simple_name} ,
production_date = to_date (#{production_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
proc_store_id = to_number(#{proc_store_id}) ,
proc_store_no = to_number(#{proc_store_no}) ,
common_name = #{common_name} ,
six_type_code = #{six_type_code} ,
where group_id = #{group_id} AND hos_id = #{hos_id} AND copy_code = #{copy_code} AND ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_card_no, a.ass_ori_card_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, ad.ass_code ass_id_code, ad.ass_name ass_id_name, a.gb_code, a.gb_code||' '||agd.gb_name gb_code_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_mondl, a.ass_brand, a.ass_amount, a.unit_code, hu.unit_name unit_code_name, a.fac_no, a.fac_id, hfd.fac_code fac_id_code, hfd.fac_name fac_id_name, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, hsd.sup_code ven_id_code, hsd.sup_name ven_id_name, a.is_dept, case when a.is_dept = 0 then '' when a.is_dept = 1 then '' else '' end is_dept_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, hdd.dept_code dept_id_code, hdd.dept_name dept_id_name, a.store_id, a.store_no, htd.store_code store_id_code, htd.store_name store_id_name, a.price, a.depre_money, a.manage_depre_money, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.buy_type, abtd.bus_type_name buy_type_name, a.use_state, acus.state_name use_state_name, a.is_depr, case when a.is_depr = 0 then '' when a.is_depr = 1 then '' else '' end is_depr_name, a.depr_method, admd1.ass_depre_name depr_method_name, a.acc_depre_amount, a.is_manage_depre, case when a.is_manage_depre = 0 then '' when a.is_manage_depre = 1 then '' else '' end is_manage_depre_name, a.manage_depr_method, admd2.ass_depre_name manage_depr_method_name, a.manage_depre_amount, a.is_measure, case when a.is_measure = 0 then '' when a.is_measure = 1 then '' else '' end is_measure_name, a.is_throw, case when a.is_throw = 0 then '' when a.is_throw = 1 then '' else '' end is_throw_name, a.pact_code, a.contract_code, a.file_number, a.ins_money, a.ins_date, a.accept_emp, su.emp_name accept_emp_name, a.accept_date, a.service_date, a.ass_seq_no, a.location, a.note, a.ass_in_no, a.in_date, a.run_date, a.is_bar, case when a.is_bar = 0 then '' when a.is_bar = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_name, a.bar_type, case when a.bar_type = 1 then '' when a.bar_type = 2 then '' else '' end bar_type_name, a.bar_code, a.bar_url, a.book_amount, a.relic_amount, a.relic_grade_code, a.is_init, case when a.is_init = 0 then '' when a.is_init = 1 then '' else '' end is_init_name, a.dispose_type, a.adt.dispose_type_name dispose_type_name, a.dispose_cost, a.dispose_income, a.dispose_tax, a.proj_id, a.proj_no, hpd.proj_code proj_id_code, hpd.proj_name proj_id_name, a.ass_purpose, aud.equi_usage_name ass_purpose_name, a.dispose_date, a.apply_date, a.add_depre_month, a.add_manage_month, a.reg_no, cert.cert_inv_name reg_no_name, a.is_bar_print, case when a.is_bar_print = 0 then '' when a.is_bar_print = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_print_name, a.measure_type, case when a.measure_type = 0 then 'A' when a.measure_type = 1 then 'B' when a.measure_type = 2 then 'C' else '' end measure_type_name, a.measure_king_code, amkd.measure_king_name measure_king_code_name, a.simple_name, a.production_date, a.move_date, a.proc_store_id, a.proc_store_no, htd_proc.store_code proc_store_id_code, htd_proc.store_name proc_store_id_name, a.common_name, a.six_type_code, ats.type_name six_type_code_name FROM ASS_CARD_Other a
left join ass_no_dict ad on a.group_id = ad.group_id and a.hos_id = ad.hos_id and a.copy_code = ad.copy_code and a.ass_id = ad.ass_id and ad.is_stop = 0
left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on a.group_id = hfd.group_id and a.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and a.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and hfd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.ven_id = hsd.sup_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on a.group_id = hdd.group_id and a.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and a.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict htd on a.group_id = htd.group_id and a.hos_id = htd.hos_id and a.store_id = htd.store_id and htd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_bus_type_dict abtd on a.group_id = abtd.group_id and a.hos_id = abtd.hos_id and a.copy_code = abtd.copy_code and a.buy_type = abtd.bus_type_code and abtd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_card_use_state acus on a.use_state = acus.state_code and acus.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd1 on a.depr_method = admd1.ass_depre_code and admd1.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd2 on a.manage_depr_method = admd2.ass_depre_code and admd2.is_stop = 0
left join ass_dispose_type adt on a.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code and adt.is_stop = 0
left join hos_emp_dict su on a.group_id = su.group_id and a.hos_id = su.hos_id and a.accept_emp = su.emp_id and su.is_stop = 0
left join hos_proj_dict hpd on a.group_id = hpd.group_id and a.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and a.proj_id = hpd.proj_id and hpd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_usage_dict aud on a.group_id = aud.group_id and a.hos_id = aud.hos_id and a.copy_code = aud.copy_code and a.ass_purpose = aud.equi_usage_code
left join ass_gb_dict agd on a.gb_code = agd.gb_code
left join ass_measure_king_dict amkd on a.group_id = amkd.group_id and a.hos_id = amkd.hos_id and a.copy_code = amkd.copy_code and a.measure_king_code = amkd.measure_king_code
left join ASS_CERT_MAIN cert on a.group_id = cert.group_id and a.hos_id = cert.hos_id and a.copy_code = cert.copy_code and a.reg_no = cert.cert_code
left join hos_store_dict htd_proc on a.group_id = htd_proc.group_id and a.hos_id = htd_proc.hos_id and a.proc_store_id = htd_proc.store_id and htd_proc.is_stop = 0
left join ASS_TYPE_SIXEIGHT ats on a.group_id = ats.group_id and a.hos_id = ats.hos_id and a.copy_code = ats.copy_code and a.six_type_code = ats.type_code
WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_card_no, a.ass_ori_card_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, ad.ass_code ass_id_code, ad.ass_name ass_id_name, a.gb_code, a.gb_code||' '||agd.gb_name gb_code_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_mondl, a.ass_brand, a.ass_amount, a.unit_code, hu.unit_name unit_code_name, a.fac_no, a.fac_id, hfd.fac_code fac_id_code, hfd.fac_name fac_id_name, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, hsd.sup_code ven_id_code, hsd.sup_name ven_id_name, a.is_dept, case when a.is_dept = 0 then '' when a.is_dept = 1 then '' else '' end is_dept_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, hdd.dept_code dept_id_code, hdd.dept_name dept_id_name, a.store_id, a.store_no, htd.store_code store_id_code, htd.store_name store_id_name, a.price, a.depre_money, a.manage_depre_money, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.buy_type, abtd.bus_type_name buy_type_name, a.use_state, acus.state_name use_state_name, a.is_depr, case when a.is_depr = 0 then '' when a.is_depr = 1 then '' else '' end is_depr_name, a.depr_method, admd1.ass_depre_name depr_method_name, a.acc_depre_amount, a.is_manage_depre, case when a.is_manage_depre = 0 then '' when a.is_manage_depre = 1 then '' else '' end is_manage_depre_name, a.manage_depr_method, admd2.ass_depre_name manage_depr_method_name, a.manage_depre_amount, a.is_measure, case when a.is_measure = 0 then '' when a.is_measure = 1 then '' else '' end is_measure_name, a.is_throw, case when a.is_throw = 0 then '' when a.is_throw = 1 then '' else '' end is_throw_name, a.pact_code, a.ins_money, a.ins_date, a.accept_emp, su.emp_name accept_emp_name, a.accept_date, a.service_date, a.ass_seq_no, a.location, a.note, a.ass_in_no, a.in_date, a.run_date, a.is_bar, case when a.is_bar = 0 then '' when a.is_bar = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_name, a.bar_type, case when a.bar_type = 1 then '' when a.bar_type = 2 then '' else '' end bar_type_name, a.bar_code, a.bar_url, a.book_amount, a.relic_amount, a.relic_grade_code, a.is_init, case when a.is_init = 0 then '' when a.is_init = 1 then '' else '' end is_init_name, a.dispose_type, a.adt.dispose_type_name dispose_type_name, a.dispose_cost, a.dispose_income, a.dispose_tax, a.proj_id, a.proj_no, hpd.proj_code proj_id_code, hpd.proj_name proj_id_name, a.ass_purpose, aud.equi_usage_name ass_purpose_name, a.dispose_date, a.apply_date, a.add_depre_month, a.add_manage_month, a.reg_no, a.is_bar_print, case when a.is_bar_print = 0 then '' when a.is_bar_print = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_print_name, a.measure_type, case when a.measure_type = 0 then 'A' when a.measure_type = 1 then 'B' when a.measure_type = 2 then 'C' else '' end measure_type_name, a.measure_king_code, amkd.measure_king_name measure_king_code_name, a.simple_name, a.production_date, a.move_date, a.proc_store_id, a.proc_store_no, htd_proc.store_code proc_store_id_code, htd_proc.store_name proc_store_id_name, a.common_name, a.six_type_code, ats.type_name six_type_code_name FROM ASS_CARD_Other a
left join ass_no_dict ad on a.group_id = ad.group_id and a.hos_id = ad.hos_id and a.copy_code = ad.copy_code and a.ass_id = ad.ass_id and ad.is_stop = 0
left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on a.group_id = hfd.group_id and a.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and a.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and hfd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.ven_id = hsd.sup_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on a.group_id = hdd.group_id and a.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and a.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict htd on a.group_id = htd.group_id and a.hos_id = htd.hos_id and a.store_id = htd.store_id and htd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_bus_type_dict abtd on a.group_id = abtd.group_id and a.hos_id = abtd.hos_id and a.copy_code = abtd.copy_code and a.buy_type = abtd.bus_type_code and abtd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_card_use_state acus on a.use_state = acus.state_code and acus.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd1 on a.depr_method = admd1.ass_depre_code and admd1.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd2 on a.manage_depr_method = admd2.ass_depre_code and admd2.is_stop = 0
left join ass_dispose_type adt on a.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code and adt.is_stop = 0
left join hos_emp_dict su on a.group_id = su.group_id and a.hos_id = su.hos_id and a.accept_emp = su.emp_id and su.is_stop = 0
left join hos_proj_dict hpd on a.group_id = hpd.group_id and a.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and a.proj_id = hpd.proj_id and hpd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_usage_dict aud on a.group_id = aud.group_id and a.hos_id = aud.hos_id and a.copy_code = aud.copy_code and a.ass_purpose = aud.equi_usage_code
left join ass_gb_dict agd on a.gb_code = agd.gb_code
left join ass_measure_king_dict amkd on a.group_id = amkd.group_id and a.hos_id = amkd.hos_id and a.copy_code = amkd.copy_code and a.measure_king_code = amkd.measure_king_code
left join hos_store_dict htd_proc on a.group_id = htd_proc.group_id and a.hos_id = htd_proc.hos_id and a.proc_store_id = htd_proc.store_id and htd_proc.is_stop = 0
left join ASS_TYPE_SIXEIGHT ats on a.group_id = ats.group_id and a.hos_id = ats.hos_id and a.copy_code = ats.copy_code and a.six_type_code = ats.type_code
AND a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.use_state != 6 and a.use_state != 7
AND a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
AND a.ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no}
AND a.ass_id = #{ass_id}
AND a.ass_no = #{ass_no}
AND a.ass_spec = #{ass_spec}
AND a.ass_mondl = #{ass_mondl}
order by a.ass_card_no asc

select a.ass_card_no id, a.ass_card_no, a.ass_ori_card_no, ad.ass_code, ad.ass_name ass_id, a.ass_spec, a.ass_mondl, a.ass_brand, hu.unit_name unit_code, hfd.fac_name fac_id, hfd.fac_code, hsd.sup_name ven_id, hsd.sup_code ven_code, pact_code, abtd.bus_type_name buy_type, abtd.bus_type_code, to_char(a.ins_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ins_date, to_char(a.ins_money, 'FM999,999,990.00') ins_money, su.user_name accept_emp, a.accept_date, a.ass_in_no, to_char(a.in_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') in_date, to_char(a.run_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') run_date, case when a.is_dept = 0 then '' when a.is_dept = 1 then '' else '' end is_dept, htd.store_code, htd.store_name store_id, hdd.dept_code, hdd.dept_name dept_id, a.ass_seq_no, aud.equi_usage_code, aud.equi_usage_name ass_purpose, hpd.proj_code, hpd.proj_name proj_id, a.location, case when a.is_measure = 0 then '' when a.is_measure = 1 then '' else '' end is_measure, case when a.is_throw = 0 then '' when a.is_throw = 1 then '' else '' end is_throw, case when a.is_bar = 0 then '' when a.is_bar = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar, case when a.bar_type = 0 then '' when a.bar_type = 2 then '' else '' end bar_type, a.bar_code, case when a.is_depr = 0 then '' when a.is_depr = 1 then '' else '' end is_depr, admd1.ass_depre_code, admd1.ass_depre_name depr_method, a.acc_depre_amount, case when a.is_manage_depre = 0 then '' when a.is_manage_depre = 1 then '' else '' end is_manage_depre, admd2.ass_depre_code, admd2.ass_depre_name manage_depr_method, a.manage_depre_amount, to_char(a.price, 'FM999,999,990.00') price, to_char(a.depre_money, 'FM999,999,990.00') depre_money, to_char(a.manage_depre_money, 'FM999,999,990.00') manage_depre_money, to_char(a.cur_money, 'FM999,999,990.00') cur_money, to_char(a.fore_money, 'FM999,999,990.00') fore_money, a.add_depre_month, a.add_manage_month, case when a.is_init = 0 then '' when a.is_init = 1 then '' else '' end is_init, to_char(a.service_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') service_date, a.gb_code, acus.state_code, acus.state_name use_state, adt.dispose_type_code, adt.dispose_type_name dispose_type, to_char(a.apply_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') apply_date, to_char(a.dispose_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') dispose_date, to_char(a.dispose_cost, 'FM999,999,990.00') dispose_cost, to_char(a.dispose_income, 'FM999,999,990.00') dispose_income, to_char(a.dispose_tax, 'FM999,999,990.00') dispose_tax, a.note, a.book_amount, a.relic_amount, a.relic_grade_code, cert.CERT_INV_NAME reg_no, a.file_number, a.contract_code, hs.source_name, hdd.dept_name, su1.user_name as create_emp, su2.emp_name as purc_emp, to_char(al.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as create_date,td.ass_type_name,hdd.dept_code||''||hdd.dept_name dept_names,to_char(a.price, 'FM999,999,990.00') as prices, a.production_date, a.common_name from ass_card_other a
left join ass_no_dict ad on a.group_id = ad.group_id and a.hos_id = ad.hos_id and a.copy_code = ad.copy_code and a.ass_id = ad.ass_id and ad.is_stop = 0
left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on a.group_id = hfd.group_id and a.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and a.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and hfd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.ven_id = hsd.sup_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on a.group_id = hdd.group_id and a.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and a.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict htd on a.group_id = htd.group_id and a.hos_id = htd.hos_id and a.store_id = htd.store_id and htd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_bus_type_dict abtd on a.group_id = abtd.group_id and a.hos_id = abtd.hos_id and a.copy_code = abtd.copy_code and a.buy_type = abtd.bus_type_code and abtd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_card_use_state acus on a.use_state = acus.state_code and acus.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd1 on a.depr_method = admd1.ass_depre_code and admd1.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd2 on a.manage_depr_method = admd2.ass_depre_code and admd2.is_stop = 0
left join ass_dispose_type adt on a.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code and adt.is_stop = 0
left join hos_emp_dict su on a.group_id = su.group_id and a.hos_id = su.hos_id and a.accept_emp = su.emp_id and su.is_stop = 0
left join hos_proj_dict hpd on a.group_id = hpd.group_id and a.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and a.proj_id = hpd.proj_id and hpd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_usage_dict aud on a.group_id = aud.group_id and a.hos_id = aud.hos_id and a.copy_code = aud.copy_code and a.ass_purpose = aud.equi_usage_code left join ass_resource_other rs on rs.group_id = a.group_id and rs.hos_id = a.hos_id and rs.copy_code = a.copy_code and rs.ass_card_no = a.ass_card_no
left join hos_source hs on hs.group_id = rs.group_id and hs.hos_id = rs.hos_id and hs.source_id = rs.source_id and hs.is_stop = 0 left join (select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_in_no, create_emp, purc_emp, create_date from ASS_IN_MAIN_other union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_in_no, create_emp, null purc_emp, create_date from ass_in_rest_main_other union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, allot_in_no as ass_in_no, create_emp, null purc_emp, create_date from ASS_ALLOT_IN_other union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sell_in_no as ass_in_no, create_emp, null purc_emp, create_date from ass_sell_in_other union all select group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_in_no, create_emp, null purc_emp, create_date from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_other) al on al.group_id = a.group_id and al.hos_id = a.hos_id and al.copy_code = a.copy_code and al.ass_in_no = a.ass_in_no left join sys_user su1 on al.group_id = su1.group_id and al.hos_id = su1.hos_id and al.create_emp = su1.user_id left join hos_emp_dict su2 on al.group_id = su2.group_id and al.hos_id = su2.hos_id and al.purc_emp = su2.emp_id left join ASS_DICT addd on addd.group_id = a.group_id and addd.hos_id = a.hos_id and addd.copy_code = a.copy_code and addd.ass_id = a.ass_id and addd.is_stop = 0 left join ASS_TYPE_DICT td on td.group_id = addd.group_id and td.hos_id = addd.hos_id and td.copy_code = addd.copy_code and td.ass_type_id = addd.ass_type_id
left join ASS_CERT_MAIN cert on a.group_id = cert.group_id and a.hos_id = cert.hos_id and a.copy_code = cert.copy_code and a.reg_no = cert.cert_code
where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code}
AND a.ass_card_no in (${ass_card_nos})
AND a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
order by a.ass_card_no desc

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_card_no, a.ass_ori_card_no, a.ass_id, a.ass_no, ad.ass_code ass_id_code, ad.ass_name ass_id_name, a.gb_code, a.gb_code||' '||agd.gb_name gb_code_name, a.ass_spec, a.ass_mondl, a.ass_brand, a.ass_amount, a.unit_code, hu.unit_name unit_code_name, a.fac_no, a.fac_id, hfd.fac_code fac_id_code, hfd.fac_name fac_id_name, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, hsd.sup_code ven_id_code, hsd.sup_name ven_id_name, a.is_dept, case when a.is_dept = 0 then '' when a.is_dept = 1 then '' else '' end is_dept_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, hdd.dept_code dept_id_code, hdd.dept_name dept_id_name, a.store_id, a.store_no, htd.store_code store_id_code, htd.store_name store_id_name, a.price, a.depre_money, a.manage_depre_money, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.buy_type, abtd.bus_type_name buy_type_name, a.use_state, acus.state_name use_state_name, a.is_depr, case when a.is_depr = 0 then '' when a.is_depr = 1 then '' else '' end is_depr_name, a.depr_method, admd1.ass_depre_name depr_method_name, a.acc_depre_amount, a.is_manage_depre, case when a.is_manage_depre = 0 then '' when a.is_manage_depre = 1 then '' else '' end is_manage_depre_name, a.manage_depr_method, admd2.ass_depre_name manage_depr_method_name, a.manage_depre_amount, a.is_measure, case when a.is_measure = 0 then '' when a.is_measure = 1 then '' else '' end is_measure_name, a.is_throw, case when a.is_throw = 0 then '' when a.is_throw = 1 then '' else '' end is_throw_name, a.pact_code, a.ins_money, a.ins_date, a.accept_emp, su.emp_name accept_emp_name, a.accept_date, a.service_date, a.ass_seq_no, a.location, a.note, a.ass_in_no, a.in_date, a.run_date, a.is_bar, case when a.is_bar = 0 then '' when a.is_bar = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_name, a.bar_type, case when a.bar_type = 1 then '' when a.bar_type = 2 then '' else '' end bar_type_name, a.bar_code, a.bar_url, a.is_init, case when a.is_init = 0 then '' when a.is_init = 1 then '' else '' end is_init_name, a.dispose_type, a.adt.dispose_type_name dispose_type_name, a.dispose_cost, a.dispose_income, a.dispose_tax, a.proj_id, a.proj_no, hpd.proj_code proj_id_code, hpd.proj_name proj_id_name, a.ass_purpose, aud.equi_usage_name ass_purpose_name, a.dispose_date, a.apply_date, a.add_depre_month, a.add_manage_month, a.reg_no, a.is_bar_print, case when a.is_bar_print = 0 then '' when a.is_bar_print = 1 then '' else '' end is_bar_print_name, a.measure_type, case when a.measure_type = 0 then 'A' when a.measure_type = 1 then 'B' when a.measure_type = 2 then 'C' else '' end measure_type_name, a.measure_king_code, amkd.measure_king_name measure_king_code_name, a.production_date, a.move_date, a.proc_store_id, a.proc_store_no, htd_proc.store_code proc_store_id_code, htd_proc.store_name proc_store_id_name, a.common_name, a.six_type_code, ats.type_name six_type_code_name FROM ASS_CARD_OTHER a
left join ass_no_dict ad on a.group_id = ad.group_id and a.hos_id = ad.hos_id and a.copy_code = ad.copy_code and a.ass_id = ad.ass_id and ad.is_stop = 0
left join ass_type_dict atd on ad.group_id = atd.group_id and ad.hos_id = atd.hos_id and ad.copy_code = atd.copy_code and ad.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id and atd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_unit hu on a.group_id = hu.group_id and a.hos_id = hu.hos_id and a.unit_code = hu.unit_code
left join hos_fac_dict hfd on a.group_id = hfd.group_id and a.hos_id = hfd.hos_id and a.fac_id = hfd.fac_id and hfd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.ven_id = hsd.sup_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on a.group_id = hdd.group_id and a.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and a.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict htd on a.group_id = htd.group_id and a.hos_id = htd.hos_id and a.store_id = htd.store_id and htd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_bus_type_dict abtd on a.group_id = abtd.group_id and a.hos_id = abtd.hos_id and a.copy_code = abtd.copy_code and a.buy_type = abtd.bus_type_code and abtd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_card_use_state acus on a.use_state = acus.state_code and acus.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd1 on a.depr_method = admd1.ass_depre_code and admd1.is_stop = 0
left join ass_depre_method_dict admd2 on a.manage_depr_method = admd2.ass_depre_code and admd2.is_stop = 0
left join ass_dispose_type adt on a.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code and adt.is_stop = 0
left join hos_emp_dict su on a.group_id = su.group_id and a.hos_id = su.hos_id and a.accept_emp = su.emp_id and su.is_stop = 0
left join hos_proj_dict hpd on a.group_id = hpd.group_id and a.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and a.proj_id = hpd.proj_id and hpd.is_stop = 0
left join ass_usage_dict aud on a.group_id = aud.group_id and a.hos_id = aud.hos_id and a.copy_code = aud.copy_code and a.ass_purpose = aud.equi_usage_code
left join ass_gb_dict agd on a.gb_code = agd.gb_code
left join ass_measure_king_dict amkd on a.group_id = amkd.group_id and a.hos_id = amkd.hos_id and a.copy_code = amkd.copy_code and a.measure_king_code = amkd.measure_king_code
left join hos_store_dict htd_proc on a.group_id = htd_proc.group_id and a.hos_id = htd_proc.hos_id and a.proc_store_id = htd_proc.store_id and htd_proc.is_stop = 0
left join ASS_TYPE_SIXEIGHT ats on a.group_id = ats.group_id and a.hos_id = ats.hos_id and a.copy_code = ats.copy_code and a.six_type_code = ats.type_code
AND a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code}
AND a.ass_card_no = #{ass_ori_card_no}
